page.title: 15 INDUSTRY IN CHARLTON KINGS
page.content: IN JEYES FACTORY, PLASTIC BOTTLES ARE MADE AND FILLED WITH BLEACH.WORKERS CLOCK IN AT 8AM AND GO TO THEIR LINES, 8 TO A LINE.BOTTLES MOVE ON A CONVEYOR BELT.THEY GO THROUGH A PRINTING PROCESS AND THEN FILLED.BAD BOTTLES ARE REMOVED FOR RECYCLING.BOTTLES PASS DOWN THE LINE TO BE CAPPED AND PACKED, 12 A BOX.THE BOXES ARE SEALED THEN STACKED ON WOODEN PALLETS.THEY THEN GO TO THE WAREHOUSE FOR STORAGE.TO RELIVE BOREDEM PACKERS CHANGE JOBS EVERY HALF HOUR. ONE OPENS BOXES,ONE PACKS 8 BOTTLES,ONE PACKS 4 MORE ETC.TEA BREAK IN THE MORNING IS 10 MINUTES.1 HOUR LUNCH BREAK (12.30PM-1.30PM),NO AFTER- NOON BREAK.WE FINISH AT 5PM.BLEACH BURNS,SO SAFTEY GLASSES,OVERALLS AND RUBBER-GLOVES ARE WORN.MY GRANNY PACKS SHE SAYS IT SOUNDS BORING BUT THE WORKERS ARE HAPPY AND LAUGH A LOT.
